info.title: Data Collection API Reference
info.description: Reference for the Brightcove Data Collection API, used to send analytics data to the Brightcove analytics system.

get.description: Send event information to the data collector for Brightcove Analytics

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: account id

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: always equal to videocloud

parameters.name: device_os
parameters.description: Override to specify the OS of the device that originated the event in cases where the User Agent is unreliable (ignored unless both device os and device type are included or if the value submitted is not in the list of values shown here. Not typically included)

parameters.name: device_manufacturer
parameters.description: Override to specify the manufacturer of the device that originated the event in cases where the User Agent is unreliable (Not typically included)

parameters.name: device_os_version
parameters.description: The version of os being used by the device. When not specified, this will be calculated by parsing the user agent string for the tracking request

parameters.name: device_type
parameters.description: Override to specify the type of the device that originated the event in cases where the User Agent is unreliable (ignored unless both device os and device type are included or if the value submitted is not in the list of values shown here. Not typically included)

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: the event type

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: URI that originated the event

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: URI that sent the end-user to the destination URI

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: the timestamp for the event in epoch time (milliseconds)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166 (alpha 2) region cISO-3166 (alpha 2) region code (override in case the system can not detect geographic information from the IP address) Not typically included

parameters.name: country_name
parameters.description: Human readable country name (override in case the system can not detect geographic information from the IP address) Not typically included

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: ISO-3166 (alpha 2) region code (override in case the system can not detect geographic information from the IP address) Not typically included

parameters.name: region_name
parameters.description: Human readable region name (override in case the system can not detect geographic information from the IP address) Not typically included

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name Not typically included

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: A unique user identifier - if not provided or blank, Video Cloud uses the fallback method of using the Source IP address + the User-Agent String as the unique identifier; Note that Brightcove uses this information only to calculate unique users. The user data itself cannot retrieved via the API or Analytics module

parameters.name: catalog_url
parameters.description: The destination url associated with the catalog_request event

parameters.name: catalog_url
parameters.description: The destination url associated with the catalog_request event that initiated this response

parameters.name: response_time_ms
parameters.description: The time, in milliseconds, between the catalog_request event and the catalog_response event

parameters.name: error_code
parameters.description: A platform specific error code associated with the event

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: the video id

parameters.name: video_name
parameters.description: the video name

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: the video id

parameters.name: video_name
parameters.description: the video name

parameters.name: start_time_ms
parameters.description: The time, in milliseconds, between initiation of playback and the first frame of the video being rendered. This can be different depending on the experience, for instance, if there are no pre-roll ads configured, this measurement is the time between the play_request and video_view events. If there is a preroll ad, the time between ad_mode_begin and ad_mode_complete should not be included

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: the video id

parameters.name: video_name
parameters.description: the video name

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: the range of the video video viewed for video_engagement events in the format StartSecond..EndSecond - range can be left out of an engagement event to show that during the period covered by the event, there was no viewing activity. (for example, when there is only re-buffering activity)

parameters.name: rendition_url
parameters.description: The url to the most recently selected rendition. For example, for an HLS stream this would be the url to the most recently selected variant

parameters.name: rendition_indicated_bps
parameters.description: The indicated bitrate, in bits per second, of the most recently selected rendition

parameters.name: rendition_mime_type
parameters.description: The mime type of the most recently selected rendition

parameters.name: rendition_height
parameters.description: The encoded height of the video rendition in pixels

parameters.name: rendition_width
parameters.description: The encoded width of the video rendition in pixels

parameters.name: rebuffering_seconds
parameters.description: The number of seconds the user spent waiting for video to playback due to un-requested delay during the engagement period

parameters.name: rebuffering_count
parameters.description: The number of times playback stopped due to re-buffering during the represented engagement period delay during the engagement period

parameters.name: forward_buffer_seconds
parameters.description: The number of seconds of video currently residing in the forward buffer

parameters.name: measured_bps
parameters.description: The ratio of the number of bits included in the most recently downloaded segment to the time spend downloading that segment, in bits per second

parameters.name: player_width
parameters.description: The current pixel width of the player at the end of the engagement range

parameters.name: player_height
parameters.description: The current pixel height of the player at the end of the engagement range

parameters.name: dropped_frames
parameters.description: dropped_frames

parameters.name: video_duration
parameters.description: the duration of the video in seconds

parameters.name: video_seconds_viewed
parameters.description: count of watched seconds since the last update for video_engagement events

RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND.description: 404: The api couldn't find the resource you requested

BAD_REQUEST.description: 400: The message fields of the response contains information about what caused the error such as invalid value for sort parameter

UNSUPPORTED_FIELD_COMBINATION_ERROR.description: 400: The message fields of the response contains information about what invalid fields were specifed

METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED.description: 405: This error occurs when the api request is made with an HTTP method other than GET

SERVER_ERROR.description: 500: Issue in Brightcove system; try again later
